extensions.name: primavera-data-service
extensions.description: Access Oracle Primavera P6 database through 7 specialized tools for project management data analysis and reporting

tools.name: sync-metadata
tools.description: Synchronize database metadata for all Primavera tables and views

tools.name: get-tables-metadata
tools.description: Retrieve metadata information about available tables and views

tools.name: get-columns-metadata-of-table
tools.description: Get detailed column information for a specific table

tools.name: query-tables-data
tools.description: Execute SQL queries against Primavera database tables

tools.name: view-job-status
tools.description: Monitor the status of background jobs and operations

tools.name: view-metadata-seed-status-of-configuration
tools.description: Check the progress of metadata seeding operations

tools.name: download-zip-data
tools.description: Download project data exports in ZIP format

authentication.note: Authentication handled by server-side environment variables
